def_cn: （与数字连用构成名词）表示“重…磅的动物（或鱼）”
def_en: -pounder can be added to numbers to form nouns that refer to animals or fish that weigh a particular number of pounds.

def_cn: （与数字连用构成名词）表示“发射…磅重炮弹的大炮”
def_en: -pounder can be added to numbers to form nouns that refer to guns that fire shells weighing a particular number of pounds.
